pr_title: Add compilation directory to debug info

timeline.message: Removes explicit addition of source cache from in debuginfotest

timeline.bodyText: This name seems wrong as the value is not actually anything to do with compilation. I understand that it is used to populate the comp_dir DWARF property but that use is incidental to its origin -- which I think it is more helpful to signal. So I'd prefer to use field name cachePath and modifying the getter accordingly.
timeline.author: adinn

replies.bodyText: I agree. This should now be fixed all the way to com.oracle.objectfile.elf.dwarf.DwarfInfoSectionImpl#writeCU.
replies.author: zakkak

timeline.message: Removes explicit addition of source cache from in debuginfotest

Adds DW_AT_comp_dir attribute to debug info

This patch adds the DW_AT_comp_dir attribute to debug info, making it
point to the appropriate source file cache. This removes the need of
using `set directores sources/jdk:sources/graal:sources/src` in gdb.
Update DEBUGINFO.md to reflect addition of DW_AT_comp_dir
Removes explicit addition of source cache from in debuginfotest
Removes explicit addition of source cache from in debuginfotest
